data.lyric:
[ti:Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:White Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer - Gene Autry
[00:05.67]You know Dasher and Dancer
[00:07.66]And Prancer and Vixen
[00:10.41]Comet and Cupid
[00:11.74]And Donner and Blitzen
[00:14.36]But do you recall
[00:18.32]The most famous reindeer of all
[00:23.38]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[00:26.55]Had a very shiny nose
[00:29.84]And if you ever saw it
[00:33.21]You would even say it glows
[00:36.57]All of the other reindeer
[00:39.85]Used to laugh and call him names
[00:43.22]They never let poor Rudolph
[00:46.66]Join in any reindeer games
[00:50.04]Then one foggy Christmas Eve
[00:53.39]Santa came to say
[00:56.88]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[01:00.12]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[01:03.57]Then all the reindeer loved him
[01:06.80]As they shouted out with glee
[01:10.39]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[01:13.67]You'll go down in history
[02:11.21]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[02:14.34]Had a very shiny nose
[02:17.85]And if you ever saw it
[02:21.24]You would even say it glows
[02:24.70]All of the other reindeer
[02:28.15]Used to laugh and call him names
[02:31.69]They never let poor Rudolph
[02:35.01]Join in any reindeer games
[02:38.58]Then one foggy Christmas Eve
[02:41.98]Santa came to say
[02:45.43]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[02:48.85]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[02:52.36]Then all the reindeer loved him
[02:55.79]As they shouted out with glee
[02:59.32]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer
[03:02.72]You'll go down in history
data.trans:
[ti:Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:White Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.67]你认识Dasher和Dancer
[00:07.65]也知道Prancer和Vixen
[00:10.40]了解Comet和Cupid
[00:11.73]以及Donner和Blitzen
[00:14.35]你是否会想起
[00:18.31]最出名的驯鹿
[00:23.37]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[00:26.55]有个闪亮的鼻子
[00:29.84]如果你看到了
[00:33.21]就知道它会闪闪发光
[00:36.57]所有其他的驯鹿
[00:39.85]过去大家常常嘲笑他还给他起绰号
[00:43.22]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph
[00:46.66]从不让他参与任何驯鹿游戏
[00:50.04]之后在一个雾蒙蒙的平安夜
[00:53.39]圣诞老人降临
[00:56.88]他说Rudolph的鼻子闪闪发亮
[01:00.12]今晚为我拉雪橇如何
[01:03.57]所有的驯鹿都喜欢他了
[01:06.80]他们一边大声地欢唱
[01:10.39]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[01:13.67]你将名垂青史
[02:11.21]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[02:14.34]有个闪亮的鼻子
[02:17.85]如果你见到了
[02:21.24]就知道它会闪闪发光
[02:24.70]所有其他的驯鹿
[02:28.15]过去大家常常嘲笑他还给他起绰号
[02:31.69]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph
[02:35.01]从不让他参与任何驯鹿游戏
[02:38.58]之后在一个雾蒙蒙的平安夜
[02:41.98]圣诞老人降临
[02:45.43]他说Rudolph的鼻子闪闪发亮
[02:48.85]今晚为我拉雪橇如何
[02:52.36]所有的驯鹿都喜欢他了
[02:55.79]他们一边大声地欢唱
[02:59.32]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[03:02.72]你将名垂青史
[03:05.74]
